title: The 10 Craziest Moments From 'Game Of Thrones- Battle Of The Bastards'
content:
Snow freaking way.
"Battle of the Bastards" was already billed as the biggest episode ever on "Game of Thrones." We knew it took 600 crew members, 500 extras, 70 horses, and more than $10 million to film over a period of 25 days, according to Entertainment Weekly. But Seven Hells! This was almost more ridiculous than the Cleveland Cavs winning the NBA championship ... almost.
Lebron's Jon Snow's army took out Ramsay Bolton's (R.I.P., Rickon and Wun Wun), Dany's dragons got so hot it made the Masters wanna retire, man, and Sansa Stark turned the hell up.
Here are the 10 craziest moments from Season 6, Episode 9:
 
Daaaaamn, Dany!
 
Say hello to my little friend.
 
Hey! Rickon's back -- eh -- never mind. 
 
You know nothing about battle, Jon Snow.
 
 
Probably ... #TormundOfTarth.
 
Littlefinger saved the day with the one army to rule them all.
 Let's hear it Wun time for the dude.
 
Family dinners are going to be awkward.
 
Eh ... he was poisoned by our enemies.
 
 
Winter is here.
Make sure to check out our "Game of Thrones" after-show for "Battle of the Bastards" below:
